parameters.name: Review Crunchbase Update and inform your manager

### 1ï¸âƒ£ ğŸ”˜ **Manual Trigger** â€” `Manual Trigger`

ğŸš€ **What it does:**
This node allows you to **manually run the workflow** during testing or setup. It doesn't trigger automatically on a schedule, but gives you control to click and run whenever you want.

ğŸ§° **Why it's useful:**
Perfect for **debugging** and **testing**. Instead of waiting for a scheduled run, you can instantly see what the workflow does.

---

### 2ï¸âƒ£ ğŸ“ **Set Competitor Name** â€” `Set Competitor Name`

ğŸ›  **What it does:**
This node manually defines the company (competitor) you're tracking on Crunchbase.

ğŸ”¡ **Example input:**

```json
{
  "Competitor": "Stripe, Inc."
}
```

ğŸ’¡ **Why it's useful:**
Allows you to customize which competitor to check â€” one at a time â€” while testing. Later, you could replace this with a list from a database or Google Sheet for full automation.

---

### 3ï¸âƒ£ ğŸ§  **Generate Crunchbase Slug** â€” `Generate Crunchbase Slug`

ğŸ”„ **What it does:**
Converts the raw company name into a **Crunchbase-friendly slug** (like a web-safe name) used in the Crunchbase API call.

ğŸ”¡ **Example:**

* `"Stripe, Inc."` â†’ `"stripe-inc"`

ğŸ§  **How it works:**

* Lowercases the text
* Removes punctuation
* Replaces spaces with hyphens (`-`)

ğŸ“Œ **Why it's important:**
Crunchbaseâ€™s API requires company slugs in the URL, not full names. This function ensures you get the correct format every time.

---

### âœ… **End of Section 1:**

You now have a properly formatted `slug` for a company like `openai` or `stripe-inc`, ready to query Crunchbase for real-time data.

---

### 4ï¸âƒ£ ğŸŒ **Fetch Crunchbase Data** â€” `Fetch Crunchbase Data`

ğŸ” **What it does:**
Makes a real-time API call to **Crunchbase** using the generated `slug`, and pulls in key information about the company â€” like funding, description, homepage, and last updated date.

ğŸ”‘ **Requires:** Crunchbase API Key

ğŸ”¡ **Example API Call:**

```http
GET https://api.crunchbase.com/api/v4/entities/organizations/stripe-inc?user_key=YOUR_API_KEY
```

ğŸ§¾ **Sample Data Retrieved:**

* `name`: Stripe
* `updated_at`: 2025-06-05T12:34:56Z
* `total_funding_usd`: 10B+
* `homepage_url`: [https://stripe.com](https://stripe.com)
* `short_description`: Online payment infrastructure

ğŸ“Œ **Why it's useful:**
This gives you all the relevant data about the competitor's recent activities that might be worth your team's attention.

---

### 5ï¸âƒ£ ğŸ“‹ **Create Review Task in ClickUp** â€” `Create Review Task in ClickUp`

ğŸ—‚ **What it does:**
Automatically creates a new **task in ClickUp**, assigning the Crunchbase update to your team for review.

ğŸ“„ **Task Includes:**

* ğŸ· Title: `Review Crunchbase Update: Stripe`
* ğŸ“ Description:

  ```text
  Company: Stripe
  Last Updated: 2025-06-05
  Description: Online payment infrastructure
  Total Funding: $10B
  Website: https://stripe.com
  ```

ğŸ’¡ **Why it's powerful:**
No manual tracking or checking needed â€” your team is alerted **automatically** when thereâ€™s something new. It ensures nothing slips through the cracks.
